subject: Re: A shipment from order EE-49023 has been delivered
raw_subject: Re: A shipment from order EE-49023 has been delivered
description:
Customer service -
I assembled the Ark light desk from my order and one of the vertical support legs (labeled part #9) was manufactured with the wrong angle and needs to be replaced. My preference is for all four parts of this assembly to be replaced to eliminate the wrong one being sent. Please advise on replacement parts ASAP. I've attached pictures for your reference.
Thank you



Cris Gross | VP Sales and Marketing

Stafford-Smith, Inc. | cell: (231) 590-8126
